mapper.select: select id, load_rct_id, exemption_type, remark, create_by, create_time, server_ip, update_by, update_time, del_flag from ruoyi.loan_exemption where id = #{id}
select id, load_rct_id, exemption_type, remark, create_by, create_time, server_ip, update_by, update_time, del_flag from ruoyi.loan_exemption limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into ruoyi.loan_exemption(load_rct_id, exemption_type, remark, create_by, create_time, server_ip, update_by, update_time, del_flag) values (#{loadRctId}, #{exemptionType}, #{remark}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{serverIp}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime}, #{delFlag})
mapper.update:
update ruoyi.loan_exemption
load_rct_id = #{loadRctId},
exemption_type = #{exemptionType},
remark = #{remark},
create_by = #{createBy},
create_time = #{createTime},
server_ip = #{serverIp},
update_by = #{updateBy},
update_time = #{updateTime},
del_flag = #{delFlag},
where id = #{id}
